properties.Observed problems: The spring was silted and blocked due to the soil erosion of lands above.
properties.Description:
Construction of 1.2m high RR masonry wall (with section 0.60x0.60, 0.45x0.60) over 0.75m width x 0.15m thick screed concrete, plastering with 1:3 Menet motor and back filling
Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal 3mx3mx2.5
Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenance

properties.Observed problems:
Absence of reservation. The contamination of water. Leakages from the side wall of the tank.
Water is being wasted from the spring. The pipeline is dilapidated.

Net needs to be provided to avoid dirt entering the spring 
Construction of curtain wall (0.075mm thk) with 1:2:4 (3/4") concrete, 1/2" dowels at 600mm x 600mm intervals and embedded with chicken mesh
Providing PVC pipes, pipe joints, etc.. to convey water from spring into the tank 
Water quality tests need to be conducted

properties.Observed problems:
The tank is dilapidated.
Absence of a retaining wall to prevent soil erosion.
